title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Set the default value for the list box parameter as 'aaa'.
2. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
3. Verify the Display type of the parameter is set to Combo Box.
4. Click on the OK button to save the changes.

OB: 

EB: The default value 'aaa' should be retained after modifying the default value.

SR: 
1. Set the default value for the list box parameter as 'aaa'.
2. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
3. Verify the Display type of the parameter is set to Combo Box.
4. Click on the OK button to save the changes.
5. Verify that the default value is retained as 'aaa'.
6. Verify that the OK button is grayed out and cannot be used.
